content: everdell supply baskets / mini game baskets keep your twigs berries resin and pebbles cozy and organized in these cute little crochet baskets can also be used for game pieces in a variety of other board games materials lily sugar n cream solids worsted weight size f 3 75mm crochet hook abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet stitch increase = increase make two single_crochet stitches into the same stitch round 1 single_crochet 8 in magic_ring 8 stitches round 2 single_crochet increase x 4 12 stitches round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 stitches round 4 single_crochet 2 increase x 6 24 stitches round 5 single_crochet 2 increase x 8 32 stitches round 6 single_crochet in back loop only to end of round 32 stitches round 7 - 9 single_crochet to end of round 32 round 10 single_crochet 5 chain 6 skip 6 stitches single_crochet 10 chain 6 skip 6 stitches single_crochet 5 32 stitches round 11 single_crochet to end of round 32 stitches cut the yarn and fasten_off weave in ends basket may need a bit of light blocking/stretching to ensure the bottom lies flat pattern by sarah meisinger instagram sarahplaysboardgames
